edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tools

Class ToolBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tools.ToolBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tool, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADLTool, AudioInfo, Droid, Exiftool, FFIdent, FileInfo, FileUtility, Jhove, MediaInfo, MetadataExtractor, TikaTool, VTTTool, XmlMetadata

    public abstract class ToolBase
extends Object
implements Tool
    An abstract class implementing the Tool interface, the base for all FITS tools.
